settings.promobar_content: The Feel Good Black Friday Sale — 25% OFF Site-wide and Free Shipping on ALL Orders

settings.about_text: A new vision of dressing for home, work, and social. Not-so-basic basics that feel and look incredible. Life's messy. Stay comfy.
settings.email_signup_text: For the latest product launches, styling tips and 10% off your first order.

settings.cta_title: DRESS IT UP, DRESS IT DOWN

settings.title: Size & Fit
settings.text:
Fits true to size for a relaxed fit.

Oleysa is 5’9”, has 23” waist and 34” hips. She usually wears a 0 and wears a XS here.

settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.text:
Free shipping on orders of $75 or more. For international shipping, please order through HopShopGo (not affiliated with Wknd Nation).

Standard orders ship the next day if placed before 12pm EST. Overnight express orders ship same day if placed by 2pm EST. 

Easy exchanges and free returns!

settings.form_description: Finally, Wknd groove meets weekday style. A new way to dress for home, work and social. Arriving February 2021.
settings.sharing_title: You’re in! Now tell your friends.
settings.sharing_description: Refer your friends to Wknd Nation and earn credit for each one who signs up. Spread the word through your social channels or with the link below:
settings.terms_content: Certain restrictions apply. Rules subject to change. Valid in the U.S. only. Credits are valid on your first Wknd Nation purchase and will be issued at launch. Private styling session is with Sofia Karvela (co-founder of Wknd Nation) or a representative of her choosing and will be virtual. Wknd Nation for a year means you will receive one piece from each drop through February 28, 2022. Number of pieces not to exceed 10.

settings.title: Give $10 and Get $10
settings.copy:
Give your friends $10 off their first purchase, and get $10 when they shop! (You’ll get rewarded for every friend!). Enter your info to unlock your referral link.


For Frequently Asked Questions on the Refer-a-Friend program, visit our FAQ page here.

settings.title: Your Friend has sent you $10 OFF
settings.copy:
Your friend has gifted you $10 OFF your first order with WkndNation!


Simply add your name and email on the form on the right hand side to receive your gift.


Be sure to copy and paste your unique code and add to the checkout. Enjoy!

settings.title: MAKE EVERY ZONE YOUR COMFORT ZONE
settings.description: Reimagined and mindfully designed essentials for crazy comfort and cool style.
